casebody.data:
EZELL, et al.
v.
HOSPITAL, et al. No. 44A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 15, 2006. William H. Elam, Charlotte, for Pammy Ezell. *611Elizabeth E. McConnell, Asheville, for Grace Hospital, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of February 2006 by Plaintiff-Intervenor for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Denied. By order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of February 2006."
